testcase.name: shouldFailToCreateEmployeeWithInvalidJoinDate
testcase.system-out: 2025-07-10T11:32:50.737-05:00 ERROR 53128 --- [employee] [ parallel-8] c.p.e.s.e.GlobalExceptionHandler : WebExchangeBindException: Validation failed for argument at index 0 in method: public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<com.parameta.employee.presentation.response.CreateEmployeeResponse>> com.parameta.employee.presentation.controller.CreateEmployeeController.createEmployee(com.parameta.employee.application.dto.CreateEmployeeRequest), with 1 error(s): [Field error in object 'createEmployeeRequest' on field 'joinDate': rejected value [01-01-2020]; codes [typeMismatch.createEmployeeRequest.joinDate,typeMismatch.joinDate,typeMismatch.java.time.LocalDate,typeMismatch]; arguments [org.springframework.context.support.DefaultMessageSourceResolvable: codes [createEmployeeRequest.joinDate,joinDate]; arguments []; default message [joinDate]]; default message [Failed to convert value of type 'java.lang.String' to required type 'java.time.LocalDate'; Failed to convert from type [java.lang.String] to type [@jakarta.validation.constraints.NotNull @org.springframework.format.annotation.DateTimeFormat java.time.LocalDate] for value [01-01-2020]]]

testcase.name: shouldFailToCreateEmployeeWithInvalidBirthDate
testcase.system-out: 2025-07-10T11:32:50.950-05:00 ERROR 53128 --- [employee] [ parallel-10] c.p.e.s.e.GlobalExceptionHandler : WebExchangeBindException: Validation failed for argument at index 0 in method: public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<com.parameta.employee.presentation.response.CreateEmployeeResponse>> com.parameta.employee.presentation.controller.CreateEmployeeController.createEmployee(com.parameta.employee.application.dto.CreateEmployeeRequest), with 1 error(s): [Field error in object 'createEmployeeRequest' on field 'birthDate': rejected value [01-1990-01]; codes [typeMismatch.createEmployeeRequest.birthDate,typeMismatch.birthDate,typeMismatch.java.time.LocalDate,typeMismatch]; arguments [org.springframework.context.support.DefaultMessageSourceResolvable: codes [createEmployeeRequest.birthDate,birthDate]; arguments []; default message [birthDate]]; default message [Failed to convert value of type 'java.lang.String' to required type 'java.time.LocalDate'; Failed to convert from type [java.lang.String] to type [@jakarta.validation.constraints.NotNull @org.springframework.format.annotation.DateTimeFormat java.time.LocalDate] for value [01-1990-01]]]
